## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Security fix
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Checklist

Please ensure your PR meets these requirements:

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (ran `cargo fmt`)
- [ ] I have run `cargo clippy` and addressed all warnings
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code compiles without errors or warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`cargo test`)
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated doc comments for public APIs
- [ ] I have updated the WHITEPAPER.md or TOKENOMICS.md (if applicable)

### Other
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked my code for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if maintained)
- [ ] I have assigned appropriate labels to this PR

## Breaking Changes

If this is a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration path for existing users.

Add any other notes about the pull request here.

## Reviewer Checklist

For maintainers reviewing this PR:

- [ ] Code quality and style are acceptable
- [ ] Tests are adequate and passing
- [ ] Documentation is complete and accurate
- [ ] No security concerns
- [ ] CI checks are passing
- [ ] Breaking changes are properly documented
